our partners

Welcome to Geeks of London! We organise meetups for all different types of geeks, from movie geeks and comic book geeks, to scifi geeks and ice cream geeks.

We hold various events/meetups, from small meetup events to BarCamps, HackCamps, and other unconferences. Have a look at the upcoming events section to see some of out upcoming events.

Welcome to the new site!

Posted by Cristiano Betta on 28 Aug 2011

It’s not fully featured yet and it needs some content, but we are getting there!
